msg:
the field 'args' has an invalid value, which appears to include a variable that is undefined. The error was: 'ec2_instance_count' is undefined

The error appears to have been in '/etc/ansible/playbooks/home/install_ec2.yml': line 19, column 5, but may
be elsewhere in the file depending on the exact syntax problem.

The offending line appears to be:


  - name: Launch instances
    ^ here
